attributes.action: Sack every Minister who has stolen our money for thier own personal gain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers who have abused our trust and our taxes for thier own gain must be forced to resign and pay back that money they have stolen from us. For example. Jaqui Smith (Home Sec) who has claimed for a residence in London despite the fact she has an official residence provided for her. We work hard to pay your wages and expenses and this is wrong.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
